function.name: get_user_info
function.description: Retrieves user information based on user ID.

function.name: convert_temperature
function.description: Converts temperature from Celsius to Fahrenheit.

function.name: longest_word_in_sentences
function.description: Finds the longest word in each sentence.

function.name: toggle_flag
function.description: Toggles a boolean flag.

function.name: send_email
function.description: Sends an email with the specified subject and body to the recipient.

function.name: process_records
function.description: Process a list of records, where each record is a dictionary with string keys and integer values.

records.description: A list containing dictionaries that map strings to integers.

function.name: merge_dicts
function.description: Merges two dictionaries.

function.name: calculate_sum
function.description: Calculates the sum of two integers.

function.name: fetch_weather
function.description: Fetches the weather information for the specified location.

location.description: The location to fetch weather for.

function.name: fetch_current_datetime
function.description: Get the current time as a JSON string, optionally formatted.

format.description: The format in which to return the current time. Defaults to None, which uses a standard format.
